title: The Future of JavaScript Frameworks
description: A deep dive into the trends and future of modern JavaScript frameworks, comparing and contrasting the most popular options.

title: Scalable Backend Architectures with Node.js
description: Learn how to design and build backend systems that can handle millions of users, using advanced Node.js techniques.

title: Mastering CSS Grid and Flexbox
description: A hands-on workshop to master the modern CSS layout modules, Grid and Flexbox, for creating complex and responsive designs.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: Get started with the exciting world of Machine Learning. This talk covers the basics of ML using Python and popular libraries.

title: DevOps for Developers: A Practical Guide
description: This session demystifies DevOps, providing a practical roadmap for developers to implement CI/CD pipelines and improve deployment workflows.

title: The Art of Debugging
description: Learn systematic and effective strategies to find and fix bugs faster, turning debugging from a chore into a skill.
